short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Top Weather Updates New Tab is the free extension for receiving weather forecast in New Tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Top Weather Updates New Tab is a functional tool that provides detailed 5-Day weather forecast for your site along with an exceptional custom search experience powered by Bing.

Keeping yourself informed about weather conditions is of utmost importance, and this handy extension streamlines the process, enabling you to easily monitor the weather. The user-friendly interface and intuitive design have been carefully crafted to enhance your ease and comfort.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install "Top Weather Updates" Chrome extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Visit our website at https://topweatherupdates.com/
Read About us: https://topweatherupdates.com/about-tab/
Read our Privacy Policy: https://topweatherupdates.com/privacy-policy/
Read our Terms and Conditions: https://topweatherupdates.com/terms-conditions/
Uninstall Instructions: https://topweatherupdates.com/uninstalling-a-chrome-extension/
